about_the_game:
Overview

ATTENTION CONVICTS: The president is replacing the annual turkey pardon with an opportunity of a lifetime. You and your fellow convicts have been selected to compete for your freedom! Take turns going head to head as your questionable past is openly discussed. Deceive, lie, and plea for your life as you say anything to win over your fellow inmates.

The Defendants

Every round 2 convicts must defend their past actions displayed at the top center of the screen. Your fellow convicts vote on who they think should be pardoned based on your defenses. First to 9 points wins!

The Jury

For games involving more than three players, the jury is in charge of voting for the winner of each round.

The Judge

The judge commands the court room as best they can. They dictate the order each defendant gets to speak and for how long before the jury votes. The judge also votes on occasion.

Tutorial Mode

Learn the game on the go! Popup menus teach new players how to play the game while they play with their experienced peers.

Character Customization

Customize your character with over 500 different character combinations!

Express Yourself

Express yourself with character emotes and lobby chat system!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 @ 2.4 GHz, AMD FX 8120 @ 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: DisOrder In The Court is a 3-8 player party game where players must talk themselves out of comically embarrassing or ridiculous scenarios. Play as convicts competing for a presidential pardon as your questionable past is brought to light.
